item.description:
OUTING ANNOUNCEMENT

WHERE: Mystic Lakes, Winchester

WHEN: 2:00 p.m.-5:00 p.m.

THE SCENE: A medium sized lake with beach, interesting wooded shoreline with paths, multiple outlooks.

WHERE TO MEET*: Note: We meet at the time above. You have 30 minutes additional slack, after which we may leave to the painting site without you.
Winchester Center Starbucks

DIRECTIONS: From 93, take the Fellsway West Winchester. When you get off the exit go around the rotary until you see a sign for South Border Road. Take that road and go straight, past 2 lights, 3 miles into winchester center. Once in the center, Starbucks will be on your left, around the small rotary.

From 128, take the route 3 (or 3A) Winchester exit, follow it straight about 4 or so miles. You will pass a large 5 way intersection, continue straight up the incline. You will pass Mahoney's Rocky Ledge farm. At the 2nd lights after Mahoneys, take a left. that wll lead directly into the center. When you arrive, Starbucks will be towards your right, part-way around the rotary.

OTHER:
RSVPs: It's best to let us know you are coming so we can look for you or alert you to any changes.
THINGS TO BRING WHICH ARE OFTEN FORGOTTEN:
Mosquito repellant, Paper towels, Sweater, water, foodIF LOST: If you become lost getting there, call.
*LAX: You have a half hour of leeway to meet us. After that we may leave without you.
INCLEMENT WEATHER: It is up to you to determine if the weather makes painting untenable. Although, I will try to leave a message on my voice mail if I myself do not intend to be there.

Michael Emerald
617/968-0627
westpointusma@yahoo.com
item.name: Mystic Lakes, Winchester
